mods.abstract: In "Inspiration," Andre Martel (Robert Montgomery), a diplomat studying for the consular service, falls in love with Yvonne Valbret (Greta Garbo), an artist's model. The two become lovers, but Martel leaves when he learns of Valbret's sordid past. He later finds her poverty-stricken and buys her a country home out of pity. He also tells Valbret that he is going to marry another woman, and she pleads with him to marry her instead. Remembering his friend Liane Latour (Karen Morley), who killed herself when her lover Raymond Delval (Lewis Stone) left her, Martel goes to Valbret to rekindle their relationship. When he arrives, he finds another of Valbret's lovers begging her to return to him. Martel agrees to overlook this indiscretion, but Valbret, determined not to destroy him, writes him a farewell note and leaves while he is asleep.
